metadata.title: CVE-2022-41881 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Netty project is an event-driven asynchronous network applicationframework. In versions prior to 4.1.86.Final, a StackOverflowError can beraised when parsing a malformed crafted message due to an infiniterecursion. This issue is patched in version 4.1.86.Final. There is noworkaround, except using a custom HaProxyMessageDecoder.

criterions.comment: netty package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
